Name: +1 Bullets
Description: Increases damage by 25%.

Name: 38 Special
Description: Fires faster right after a dodge roll.

Name: 3rd Party Controller
Description: Upon hitting an enemy, they will move in the same direction the player moves, and shoot towards the crosshair if the player shoots.

Name: A.W.P.
Description: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

Name: AC-15
Description: Becomes more powerful if the player has armor.

Name: AKEY-47
Description: Opening a locked chest or door with the gun equipped opens it for free. Alternatively, shooting a locked chest or door unlocks it.

Name: AU Gun
Description: Fires a single powerful bullet.

Name: Abyssal Tentacle
Description: Fires a tentacle that homes in on and grips enemies, damaging them.

Name: Aged Bell
Description: Briefly stops enemies and enemy bullets. Can be used to steal from shops.

Name: Air Strike
Description: Calls down a bombardment on a large rectangular area.

Name: Alien Engine
Description: Rapid fire weapon that has a very short range, only damaging enemies that come into contact with the muzzle flash. Enemies damaged have a chance to catch on fire. Extremely high recoil.

Name: Alien Sidearm
Description: Charged shots are larger and deal more damage.

Name: Alpha Bullet
Description: The first shot of a weapon's magazine will deal 80% more damage.

Name: Ammo Belt
Description: Increases maximum ammo by 20%.

Name: Ammo Synthesizer
Description: Adds a chance to regain ammo upon killing an enemy.

Name: Amulet of the Pit Lord
Description: Falling into pits no longer deals damage.

Name: Ancient Hero's Bandana
Description: Quadruples maximum ammo.

Name: Angry Bullets
Description: Hitting an enemy refires the projectile at a nearby enemy.

Name: Antibody
Description: Adds a chance to heal the player for an extra half a heart whenever they receive healing.

Name: Anvillain
Description: Fires piercing anvils with high knockback and a chance to stun.

Name: Arcane Gunpowder
Description: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past, cannot be used.

Name: Armor Synthesizer
Description: Adds a chance to get armor upon completing a room.

Name: Armor of Thorns
Description: Provides immunity to contact damage, and increases damage dealt by dodge rolling into enemies. Grants armor upon pickup.

Name: BSG
Description: Slowly charges up to fire a large high-damage projectile.

Name: Baby Good Mimic
Description: If no other familiars are present, follows the player and attacks enemies. If familiars are present, transforms into another one of the player's familiars.

Name: Baby Good Shelleton
Description: Follows the player and attacks enemies with a green laser.

Name: Backpack
Description: Allows the player to hold an extra active item.

Name: Backup Gun
Description: With each shot fired, a second bullet will be fired in the opposite direction that the player is aiming.

Name: Badge
Description: Summons a police officer that follows the player, firing bullets at enemies. Can be talked to. Can die after taking too much damage. Talking to him after he dies increases the player's damage by 20% and curse by 2.

Name: Bait Launcher
Description: Fires a steak that causes a tiger to appear and maul the target.

Name: Ballistic Boots
Description: Increases movement speed.

Name: Balloon Gun
Description: Fires small homing tornadoes. While held, grants flight but loses all ammo on taking damage.

Name: Ballot
Description: Increases the player's coolness by 3, which decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

Name: Banana
Description: Fires an explosive banana that sends out three more bouncing explosive bananas.

Name: Barrel
Description: Fires a fish that has a chance to stun and leaves a pool of water on impact.

Name: Battery Bullets
Description: Causes water that bullets pass over to become electrified, damaging enemies. Decreases shot spread by 50%.

Name: Battle Standard
Description: Increases the damage of companions and charmed enemies.

Name: Bee Hive
Description: Fires bees that home in on and damage enemies.

Name: Betrayer's Shield
Description: Upon reloading, leaves a protective shield on the ground. Players in that area will be protected until the shield has absorbed a number of bullets.

Name: Big Boy
Description: Calls down a missile at the crosshair, causing a large explosion that leaves behind a large pool of poison creep. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Name: Big Iron
Description: Fires a random spread of three bullets.

Name: Big Shotgun
Description: Fires three exploding shots that burst into bullets. Reloading next to Shotgun Kin sucks them up, killing them and restoring 1 ammo.

Name: Bionic Leg
Description: Increases movement speed and grants a piece of armor.

Name: Black Hole Gun
Description: Fires black holes that attract enemies and enemy bullets.

Name: Blank Bullets
Description: Projectile impacts can trigger a short range blank. Increases curse by 1.5.

Name: Blank Companion's Ring
Description: Activates a blank each time an active item is used.

Name: Blasphemy
Description: Starting weapon of The Bullet. Swings destroy nearby bullets. At full health, swings send out a piercing sword projectile. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: Blast Helmet
Description: Decreases the radius that explosions will hurt the player in. Grants immunity to contact damage.

Name: Blood Brooch
Description: Heals the player after dealing 1200 damage to enemies. Increases Curse by 1.

Name: Bloodied Scarf
Description: Replaces the dodge roll with a teleport. Increases reload speed.

Name: Bloody 9mm
Description: Adds a chance to fire a fast, homing bullet that flies around the room damaging enemies.

Name: Bloody Eye
Description: Decreases enemy bullet speed by 15%.

Name: Blooper
Description: Fires shotgun blasts of blue bullets with high knockback.

Name: Blue Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Upon taking damage, briefly slows time.

Name: Blunderbuss
Description: Fires a short-ranged spray of bullets.

Name: Bomb
Description: Throws a bomb that explodes after a short delay.

Name: Book of Chest Anatomy
Description: Improves the contents of broken chests.

Name: Boomerang
Description: Throws a boomerang that travels around the room and attempts to stun all enemies.

Name: Bottle
Description: Holds hearts or ammo for use later.

Name: Bouncy Bullets
Description: Grants bullets the ability to bounce off objects.

Name: Bow
Description: Fully charged shots pierce.

Name: Box
Description: If the player enters a room while under the box, enemies will not target the player. Firing a weapon will remove the box. Has no effect if used while enemies are already targeting the player. Can be used to steal items from shops.

Name: Boxing Glove
Description: Shoots a boxing glove with a chance to stun. Gains a star each time it kills an enemy, up to 3. When at 3 stars, can be charged to consume the stars and fire a high-damage super punch. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Bracket Key
Description: Deals a large amount of damage to all enemies in a room. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Name: Brick Breaker
Description: Fires piercing turtle shells that bounce off of walls.

Name: Brick of Cash
Description: Reveals secret rooms.

Name: Briefcase of Cash
Description: Grants 250  and 3 .

Name: Broccoli
Description: Increases damage by 10%, adds a 10% chance to negate damage, and increases movement speed.

Name: Bubble Blaster
Description: Fires bubbles which move slowly towards enemies. Reloading the gun launches bubbles away from the player at high speed.

Name: Budget Revolver
Description: Starting gun of The Convict. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: Bug Boots
Description: Dodge rolling leaves a trail of poison creep. Makes the player immune to poison.

Name: Bullet
Description: Fires rotating guns which fire bullets as they travel.

Name: Bullet Bore
Description: Fires drills that home in on enemies, stun them, and explode after a short delay.

Name: Bullet Idol
Description: Deals 45 damage to enemies upon taking damage.

Name: Bullet Time
Description: Slows down time while active.

Name: Bumbullets
Description: Upon firing, adds a chance to fire a bee, which homes in on and damages enemies.

Name: Bundle of Wands
Description: Has a chance to transmogrify.

Name: Busted Television
Description: Upon use, the television is thrown in the direction of the cursor. Dropped upon dodge rolling.

Name: Buzzkill
Description: Fires piercing, bouncing sawblades.

Name: C4
Description: Places explosives on the ground which then can be detonated by using the item again.

Name: Cactus
Description: Fires needles.

Name: Camera
Description: Damages all enemies in the room, with a chance to stun.

Name: Cartographer's Ring
Description: New floors have a chance to be mapped out.

Name: Casey
Description: Charged swings reflect nearby bullets. Does not crack secret walls. Increases curse by 2.

Name: Cat Bullet King Throne
Description: Shoots miniature bullets upon rolling and grants flight.

Name: Cat Claw
Description: Fires darts that home in on enemies and explode after a short delay. The darts deal minimal damage on contact.

Name: Chaff Grenade
Description: Stuns enemies. Can be used to steal items from shops.

Name: Chamber Gun
Description: Transforms based on the current chamber.

Name: Chance Bullets
Description: Upon firing, adds a chance to fire projectiles from the player's other guns.

Name: Chaos Ammolet
Description: Blanks have a chance to poison, freeze, and ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Chaos Bullets
Description: Adds random bullet effects to the player's bullets.

Name: Charge Shot
Description: Fires a large laser that pierces enemies and bounces off of walls two times. Laser deals higher damage after bouncing.

Name: Charm Horn
Description: Charms enemies around the player upon use. Can be used to steal from shops.

Name: Charmed Bow
Description: Charms enemies when fully charged.

Name: Charming Rounds
Description: Adds a chance to fire bullets that charm enemies.

Name: Chest Teleporter
Description: Teleports a chest to the next floor, with a chance to upgrade its quality.

Name: Chicken Flute
Description: Summons a chicken that follows the player and blocks bullets. After taking a certain amount of damage, it summons an army of chickens to attack enemies.

Name: Cigarettes
Description: Damages the player for half a heart and increases their coolness by 1 per use. Coolness decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

Name: Clear Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Negates poison damage.

Name: Clone
Description: Upon death, the player is revived in the starting room of the first floor, retaining all items and guns.

Name: Cloranthy Ring
Description: Greatly shortens the time at the end of a dodge roll where the player is vulnerable.

Name: Clown Mask
Description: Summons a random familiar with a clown mask who either stuns enemies, protects the player with mini blanks, or attacks enemies with a shotgun. An additional familiar is spawned for each additional Payday item the player has.

Name: Cluster Mine
Description: Places 5 small mines that explode when an enemy comes into contact with them.

Name: Cobalt Hammer
Description: Fires blue lasers. Charging the weapon makes it fire lasers in four directions.

Name: Cog of Battle
Description: When reloading, pressing reload again when the indicator passes a certain mark on the reload bar will instantly reload the weapon, decreasing the reload time and increasing the damage and accuracy of the next magazine.

Name: Coin Crown
Description: Increases the chance to find  shells upon completing rooms.

Name: Cold 45
Description: Fires bullets that freeze enemies.

Name: Colt 1851
Description: Fires a burst of two bullets.

Name: Com4nd0
Description: Fires homing rockets.

Name: Combined Rifle
Description: Reloading alternates between a rapid-fire rifle and a bouncing, piercing energy ball.

Name: Composite Gun
Description: Charged shot consumes all ammo in magazine and will activate a blank effect when it hits a wall.

Name: Compressed Air Tank
Description: Fires sharks that swim around the room, seeking enemies and biting them.

Name: Coolant Leak
Description: Sprays water forward.

Name: Copper Ammolet
Description: Blanks have a chance to ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Corsair
Description: Fires slow, bouncing bullets that accelerate and curve towards enemies.

Name: Crescent Crossbow
Description: Fires stars that split into smaller bouncing stars.

Name: Crestfaller
Description: Fires bullets that slow and have a chance to freeze.

Name: Crisis Stone
Description: The player is invulnerable while reloading an empty magazine.

Name: Crossbow
Description: Fires bolts. Starting gun of The Hunter.

Name: Crown of Guns
Description: Sits atop the player's head and fires bullets in all directions.

Name: Crutch
Description: Causes bullets to slightly curve towards enemies.

Name: Cursed Bullets
Description: Increases damage depending on how much curse the player has. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Name: Dark Marker
Description: Charge shot consumes the entire clip to create a room-wide explosion and blank effect.

Name: Dart Gun
Description: Fires sticky darts. Starting gun of The Cultist. Does not crack secret walls. Only available in co-op.

Name: Daruma
Description: Can be used immediately after dodging a bullet to activate a blank effect.

Name: Deck4rd
Description: Fires a single powerful bullet that will explode upon impact.

Name: Decoy
Description: Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will be destroyed after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.

Name: Demon Head
Description: Fires a continuous beam that has a chance to inflict Burn and slightly homes in on enemies.

Name: Devolver
Description: Has a chance to devolve enemies into simpler enemies.

Name: Devolver Rounds
Description: Bullets have a chance to devolve enemies into simpler enemies.

Name: Directional Pad
Description: Fires bullets in four directions. Combos can be entered to fire fireballs or a grappling hook. After running out of ammo, it is destroyed but spawns a chest.

Name: Disarming Personality
Description: Decreases shop prices by 15%.

Name: Disintegrator
Description: Fires a large laser after a long charge-up.

Name: Dog
Description: Follows the player around, occasionally digs up a pickup upon completing a room, and barks at mimic chests.

Name: Double Vision
Description: While active, doubles the player's bullets.

Name: Dragunfire
Description: Rapidly fires burning bullets that have a chance to inflict Burn.

Name: Drill
Description: If used on a locked chest, forces the player to fight two waves of enemies and unlocks the chest if they survive. If used on a locked door, opens it for free.

Name: Drum Clip
Description: Increases the magazine size of all weapons by 50%.

Name: Duct Tape
Description: Single use. Combines 2 guns by granting one gun the projectiles that the other gun fires.

Name: Dueling Laser
Description: Fires a large, piercing, high-damage laser. Needs to recharge after each shot.

Name: Dueling Pistol
Description: Fires large piercing bullets that bounce twice.

Name: Dungeon Eagle
Description: Can be charged to fire more powerful shots.

Name: Easy Reload Bullets
Description: Dodge rolling reloads one bullet.

Name: Elder Blank
Description: Activates a blank. Increases curse by 2 while held.

Name: Elephant Gun
Description: Fires a cone spread of bullets with high knockback.

Name: Elimentaler
Description: Encases enemies in cheese, freezing them. Enemies that die while cheesed spawn a large cheese pool, which cheeses any enemies that step in it.

Name: Enraging Photo
Description: Taking damage makes the player briefly deal double damage and instantly reloads their weapon.

Name: Escape Rope
Description: Teleport out of the current room into the shop of the current floor.

Name: Evolver
Description: Killing enemies evolves the gun through 6 forms.

Name: Excaliber
Description: Fires a burst of three piercing sword projectiles. Reloading swings the sword, destroying nearby bullets and damaging nearby enemies. Increases curse by 2.5.

Name: Explosive Decoy
Description: Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will explode after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.

Name: Explosive Rounds
Description: Adds a chance to fire bullets that explode upon hitting an enemy or object.

Name: Eye of the Beholster
Description: The last shot of each clip spawns a friendly Beadie.

Name: Eyepatch
Description: Increases damage by 35% but decreases accuracy.

Name: Face Melter
Description: Simultaneously fires music notes in four directions. Places an amplifier on the ground at the player's position upon reloading. Whenever the Face Melter is fired, the amplifier will fire music notes in the same pattern. Reloading again will remove the amplifier and place a new one.

Name: Fat Bullets
Description: Doubles bullet size and knockback, increases damage by 30%, and decreases maximum ammo by 10%.

Name: Fightsabre
Description: Reloading swings the gun around, reflecting nearby bullets. Increases curse by 2.

Name: Finished Gun
Description: Replaces Unfinished Gun once the Ammonomicon is complete.

Name: Flak Bullets
Description: Whenever a bullet hits an enemy or wall, it splits into several smaller, lower-damage bullets.

Name: Flame Hand
Description: Fires fireballs that pierce enemies and have a chance to set enemies on fire.

Name: Flare Gun
Description: Fires bullets that have a chance to burn enemies.

Name: Flash Ray
Description: Shoots piercing lasers with a chance to stun.

Name: Fortune's Favor
Description: While active, bullets will curve around the player.

Name: Fossilized Gun
Description: Fires a stream of oil. Reloading spits fire, which can ignite the oil.

Name: Freeze Ray
Description: Fires a blue laser that has a chance to freeze enemies.

Name: Friendship Cookie
Description: Single use. Resurrects your co-op partner with full health.

Name: Frost Ammolet
Description: Blanks have a chance to freeze enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Frost Bullets
Description: Adds a chance to fire bullets that freeze enemies.

Name: Frost Giant
Description: Fires big bullets that have a chance to freeze.

Name: Full Metal Jacket
Description: Automatically activates one of the player's blanks when they are about to take damage.

Name: Galactic Medal of Valor
Description:
Deal more damage to Bosses.

Increases reload speed and accuracy.

Name: Gamma Ray
Description: Fires a green laser that slightly curves towards enemies and can poison.

Name: Gas Mask
Description: Grants immunity to poison.

Name: Ghost Bullets
Description: Bullets pass through enemies and obstacles.

Name: Gilded Bullets
Description: Increases damage based on the amount of money the player has.

Name: Gilded Hydra
Description: Fires a large burst of piercing, bouncing bullets. Clip size is increased by 1 for each half heart the player is missing, and healing decreases clip size.

Name: Glacier
Description: Fires bouncing ice cubes that explode and freeze enemies.

Name: Glass Cannon
Description: Fires a powerful beam. Loses all ammo upon taking damage.

Name: Glass Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Destroyed upon taking damage.

Name: Gold Ammolet
Description: Increases blank damage. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Gold Junk
Description: Grants 500  on pickup.

Name: Grappling Hook
Description: Allows players to hook onto and then pull themselves towards walls at a fast speed. Hitting enemies with the hook will deal minor damage and stun them for a short duration. Allows players to steal items from the shop. The hook has an unlimited range.

Name: Grasschopper
Description: Fires a single powerful blast that releases a small blank effect.

Name: Green Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Chance to heal upon taking damage.

Name: Grenade Launcher
Description: Shoots a grenade that bounces off of surfaces and explodes on impact with enemies.

Name: Grey Mauser
Description: Reloading an empty clip makes the player invisible. Can be used to steal from shops.

Name: GuNNER
Description: Taking damage while GuNNER is held drains 40 ammo and drops a skull that heals the player upon pickup.

Name: Gun Soul
Description: Adds a heart container. Upon death, the player respawns at the start of the current floor with one heart container. All enemies previously killed will respawn, and if the player reaches the location where they died, they will return to normal.

Name: Gunboots
Description: Dodge rolling fires a spread of five bullets backwards. Slightly increases movement speed.

Name: Gunbow
Description: Fires a fast, piercing projectile that ricochets many times.

Name: Gunderfury
Description: Gains persist experience and levels up with kills, changing its appearance and stats.

Name: Gundromeda Strain
Description: Decreases health of all enemies encountered by 25%.

Name: Gungeon Ant
Description: In oil mode, creates oil puddles on impact. In fire mode, fires fireballs that pierce and burn. Reloading switches modes.

Name: Gungeon Blueprint
Description: Reveals all floor-maps for the rest of the run.

Name: Gungeon Pepper
Description: Deals damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Gungine
Description: Greatly increases movement speed while held. Reloading clears nearby goop and refills the gun's ammo.

Name: Gunknight Armor
Description: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

Name: Gunknight Gauntlet
Description: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

Name: Gunknight Greaves
Description: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

Name: Gunknight Helmet
Description: Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup and one piece of armor every floor.

Name: Gunslinger's Ashes
Description: Fires slow homing ghosts that shoot and deal contact damage.

Name: Gunther
Description: Cannot be used to reveal hidden walls. Grows stronger with each room cleared.

Name: Gunzheng
Description: Rapidly fires inaccurate, piercing, homing arrows.

Name: H4mmer
Description: Fires a barrage of bullets. The last shot in the magazine is a hammer, which deals extra damage and can stun enemies.

Name: Hazmat Suit
Description: Grants immunity to fire, poison, and electricity.

Name: Heart Bottle
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Heart Holster
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Heart Locket
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Heart Lunchbox
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Heart Purse
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Heart Synthesizer
Description: Adds a chance to get hearts upon completing a room.

Name: Heart of Ice
Description: Grants a heart container. Taking damage releases bouncing ice bullets. Increases coolness by 1.

Name: Heavy Boots
Description: Prevents the player from being affected by enemy knockback, gun recoil, and conveyor belts.

Name: Heavy Bullets
Description: Increases damage by 25% and doubles knockback but halves bullet speed.

Name: Heck Blaster
Description: Rapidly fires invisible bullets. Jammed enemies hit will revert to normal.

Name: Hegemony Carbine
Description: Shoots rapid fire white bolts of energy.

Name: Hegemony Rifle
Description: Rapidly fires inaccurate white lasers.

Name: Helix
Description: Fires two bullets in a helix pattern.

Name: Helix Bullets
Description: Doubles fired bullets and makes them move in a helix pattern, but slightly decreases damage.

Name: Heroine
Description: Has 3 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.

Name: Hexagun
Description: Fires piercing bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.

Name: Hidden Compartment
Description: Grants an extra active item slot and increased maximum ammo by 10%.

Name: High Kaliber
Description: Causes enemy souls to leave their bodies. Touching a soul deals high damage to the enemy.

Name: Hip Holster
Description: Reloading a weapon fires it once for free.

Name: Holey Grail
Description: Upon taking damage, triggers a blank effect and refills 50% of the ammo of all the player's guns. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Homing Bullets
Description: Bullets have a chance to home in on enemies.

Name: Honeycomb
Description: Taking damage spawns bees that seek out and damage enemies.

Name: Hot Lead
Description: Adds a chance to fire bullets that ignite enemies.

Name: Hungry Bullets
Description: Adds a chance for the player's bullets to block enemy projectiles, growing in damage and size as they do so.

Name: Huntsman
Description: Fires a shotgun blast of bullets. Reloading destroys nearby bullets. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Hyper Light Blaster
Description: Has very low ammo, but regenerates 1 ammo if a shot hits an enemy.

Name: Ice Bomb
Description: Throws a bomb that freezes enemies.

Name: Ice Breaker
Description: The first two shots fire a shotgun blast of ice bullets, and the final shot fires a single explosive shot.

Name: Ice Cube
Description: Reduces the cooldown timer of active items. Increases coolness by 3.

Name: Infuriating Note
Description: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

Name: Iron Coin
Description: 3 uses. Kills all enemies in a random room on the floor. Increases coolness by 2 and grants a 20% discount at shops while held.

Name: Irradiated Lead
Description: Adds a chance to fire bullets that poison enemies.

Name: JK-47
Description: Reloading inflicts fear on nearby enemies.

Name: Jar of Bees
Description: Spawns bees that home in on and damage enemies.

Name: Jetpack
Description: Can be toggled. While active, the player has increased movement speed and flight, but cannot dodge roll. Passing over puddles of oil will set them on fire.

Name: Jolter
Description: Fires large and rectangular bullets with high knockback.

Name: Junk
Description: Has no effect on its own. Often spawned by destroying chests.

Name: Katana Bullets
Description: Upon killing an enemy, bullets have a chance to unleash a flurry of slashes along the path of the original bullet, damaging enemies. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Klobbe
Description: Rapidly fires low-damage bullets.

Name: Knife Shield
Description: Creates a ring of knives around the player that damage enemies and block enemy bullets. Knives vanish after taking enough damage. If used again while the shield is active, the knives are launched forward. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Name: Knight's Gun
Description: Fires five bullets in an arrow shape. Gains some pickups when reloading an empty clip.

Name: Kruller Glaive
Description: Throws a boomerang-like projectile that homes in on multiple enemies, damaging and sometimes stunning them.

Name: Lament Configurum
Description: Upon use, spawns several enemies and has a chance to spawn a gun or item. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Name: Laser Lotus
Description: Fires piercing lasers.

Name: Laser Rifle
Description: Fires a burst of three lasers.

Name: Laser Sight
Description: Decreases bullet spread by 50% and adds a red laser sight to the player's weapons.

Name: Lich's Eye Bullets
Description: Makes all guns act as if they have all their synergies.

Name: Lichy Trigger Finger
Description: Increases rate of fire by 25%.

Name: Lies
Description: No effect.

Name: Life Orb
Description: After killing an enemy, reloading damages all enemies in the room.

Name: Light Gun
Description: Fires zaps of light at enemies. The last bullet in the magazine is a duck, which will automatically seek out the nearest enemy and attack them.

Name: Lil' Bomber
Description: Fires a bomb that bounces off of walls and explodes on enemy contact.

Name: Liquid Valkyrie
Description: Decreases enemy bullet speed by 20%.

Name: Live Ammo
Description: Provides immunity to contact damage, and dodge rolls deal increased damage to enemies.

Name: Lodestone Ammolet
Description: Increases the knockback of blanks. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Loot Bag
Description: Enemies drop more money, but the player drops money upon taking damage. Selling other items to the Sell Creep grants twice as much money.

Name: Lower Case r
Description: Fires a burst of 6 bullets that spell out the word bullet.

Name: Luxin Cannon
Description: Fires laser shots at enemies. The last bullet of magazine fires a crystal, which splits into 5 small crystals on impact.

Name: M1
Description: Fires high-speed piercing bullets.

Name: M16
Description: Reloading alternates between bursts of 3 bullets and a grenade launcher.

Name: MAC10
Description: Fires a burst of four bullets.

Name: Machine Fist
Description: Reloading alternates between firing a gatling gun, and a single shot exploding rocket punch that is guided by the player's reticle. The rocket punch consumes 10 ammo upon firing.

Name: Macho Brace
Description: Shots are more powerful when coming out of a dodge roll.

Name: Magazine Rack
Description: Place to create a zone of infinite ammo.

Name: Magic Bullets
Description: Grants all of the player's bullets a small chance to transmogrify enemies into chickens.

Name: Magic Lamp
Description: Hitting an enemy three times causes a genie to punch them.

Name: Magic Sweet
Description: Grants a heart container, increases damage by 15%, increases movement speed, and increases coolness by 1.

Name: Mahoguny
Description: Fires bouncing explosive wood bullets and several leaves.

Name: Mailbox
Description: Fires mail at enemies. The last bullet of each magazine is a package, which can explode, leave confetti, burn, or poison.

Name: Makeshift Cannon
Description: Fires a single blast that deals a large amount of damage.

Name: Map
Description: Reveals the entire map for the current floor.

Name: Marine Sidearm
Description: Starting gun of The Marine. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: Mass Shotgun
Description: Shoots a large slow projectile that will split up in a barrage of small bullets shortly afterwards.

Name: Master Round
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Master Round
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Master Round
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Master Round
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Master Round
Description: Grants a heart container.

Name: Master of Unlocking
Description: Adds a chance to get keys upon completing rooms.

Name: Meatbun
Description: Single use. Heals the player for one heart. Grants double damage until the player takes damage.

Name: Medkit
Description: Single use. Heals the player for 4 hearts.

Name: Mega Douser
Description: Fires a stream of water.

Name: Megahand
Description: Has 2 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.

Name: Melted Rock
Description: Causes enemy corpses to explode on use.

Name: Metronome
Description: Grants a damage bonus for each enemy killed. The bonus is reset if the player takes damage or changes guns.

Name: Microtransaction Gun
Description: Shoots various figurines, books, and gems at the cost of 1 coin per shot.

Name: Military Training
Description: Increases weapon accuracy and reload speed.

Name: Mimic Tooth Necklace
Description: Every chest is guaranteed to be a Mimic.

Name: Mine Cutter
Description: Reloading alternates between firing three small, piercing, parallel lasers and single large lasers.

Name: Molotov
Description: Throws a Molotov that sets an area on fire.

Name: Molotov Launcher
Description: Fires molotovs that create fire puddles on impact.

Name: Monster Blood
Description: Taking damage spawns a pool of poison creep. Grants immunity to poison creep and a heart container.

Name: Moonscraper
Description: Fires a beam that reflects off of solid objects once.

Name: Mourning Star
Description: Calls down a controllable orbital laser.

Name: Mr. Accretion Jr.
Description: Fires planets which start orbiting the player if they hit a wall or obstacle.

Name: Muscle Relaxant
Description: Decreases bullet spread by 66%.

Name: Mustache
Description: Heals the player half a heart upon purchasing an item.

Name: Mutation
Description: Fires a continuous beam and heavily pushes back the player.

Name: Nail Gun
Description: Fires a rapid stream of low damage nails. Fires faster if fire button is tapped rather than held.

Name: Nanomachines
Description: Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup. Grants a piece of armor every 4 times damage is taken.

Name: Napalm Strike
Description: Sets a large rectangular area on fire.

Name: Number 2
Description: Boosts stats when alone. Only available in co-op, where The Cultist starts with this item.

Name: Obsidian Shell Casing
Description: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

Name: Oiled Cylinder
Description: Halves reload time.

Name: Old Crest
Description: Grants a piece of armor. Consumed upon taking any damage.

Name: Old Goldie
Description: Increases coolness by 1.

Name: Old Knight's Flask
Description: Heals the player for one heart upon use. Gains 2 charges each floor.

Name: Old Knight's Helm
Description: Grants two pieces of armor.

Name: Old Knight's Shield
Description: Grants two pieces of armor.

Name: Omega Bullets
Description: The final shot of each magazine deals double damage.

Name: Orange
Description: Single use. Fully heals the player, grants a heart container, and increases coolness by 2.

Name: Orange Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Shoots at enemies.

Name: Orbital Bullets
Description: Missed shots orbit the player.

Name: Origuni
Description: Fires paper planes that follow the player's crosshair.

Name: Owl
Description: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies and occasionally using short-ranged blanks.

Name: Partially-Eaten Cheese
Description: While active, the player is invincible and instantly kills enemies they come in contact with.

Name: Particulator
Description: Fires a large bullet, which will split into 10 bullets which seek out enemies.

Name: Patriot
Description:
Fires piercing bullets.

Fire rate increases rapidly as the trigger is held.

Name: Pea Shooter
Description: Fires peas.

Name: Phoenix
Description: Shooting creates a small cone of fire in front of the player that burns enemies.

Name: Pig
Description: Upon death, instantly revives the player with full health.

Name: Pink Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants one extra heart container.

Name: Pitchfork
Description: Fires piercing fireballs that burn.

Name: Plague Pistol
Description: Bullets create poison puddles on impact.

Name: Planar Lead
Description: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

Name: Platinum Bullets
Description: Increases damage and fire rate with every bullet that hits an enemy.

Name: Plunger
Description: Fires a stream of poison. Has a chance to poison enemies and leaves poison puddles on impact.

Name: Poison Vial
Description: Creates a pool of poison creep.

Name: Polaris
Description: Has 3 levels. Killing enough enemies causes the gun to level up, increasing its damage. Taking damage decreases its level by 1.

Name: Portable Table Device
Description: Spawns a small table that can be flipped.

Name: Portable Turret
Description: Places a stationary turret that shoots at enemies. The turret will be destroyed if it takes enough damage.

Name: Potion of Gun Friendship
Description: While active, increases damage, fire rate, knockback, and reload speed.

Name: Potion of Lead Skin
Description: While active, the player reflects enemy bullets.

Name: Poxcannon
Description: Shoots poisonous t-shirts with high knockback. Poisoned enemies create a poison puddle on death.

Name: Prime Primer
Description: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

Name: Proton Backpack
Description: Fires a homing laser.

Name: Prototype Railgun
Description: Fires a fast-moving piercing bullet.

Name: Proximity Mine
Description: Places a mine that explodes when an enemy comes near it.

Name: Pulse Cannon
Description: Fires a shotgun blast spread of 6 bullets.

Name: Quad Laser
Description: Fires a large, square, extremely slow bullet.

Name: R2G2
Description: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.

Name: RC Rocket
Description: Fires rockets guided by the player's cursor.

Name: RPG
Description: Fires grenades.

Name: RUBE-ADYNE MK.II
Description: Fires bouncing lasers with limited range.

Name: RUBE-ADYNE Prototype
Description: Fires lasers that bounce four times.

Name: Rad Gun
Description: Increases coolness by 2. When reloading, if the reload button is hit at the right time, the gun's damage is increased. Failing a reload resets the damage.

Name: Raiden Coil
Description: Fires a laser that homes in on all on-screen enemies.

Name: Railgun
Description: Fires a fast-moving piercing bullet that bounces many times.

Name: Rat Boots
Description: Grants temporary invulnerability and flight when the player steps over a pit.

Name: Ration
Description: Single use. Heals the player for two hearts. Automatically used if the player runs out of health.

Name: Rattler
Description: Simultaneously fires a shotgun blast and a beam that has a chance to poison enemies.

Name: Really Special Lute
Description: Fires in a very wide spread. Buffs the player's companions. Chance to Charm enemies.

Name: Red Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Improves dodging.

Name: Relodestone
Description: Halves reload times. While active, the player absorbs enemy bullets and regains ammo.

Name: Remote Bullets
Description: Fired bullets curve towards the player's crosshair. Increases damage by 10%.

Name: Resourceful Sack
Description: Rolling through bullets collects them in the sack. Using the sack empties the sack and fires a piece of explosive cheese for every bullet collected. Grants 3 extra active item slots.

Name: Riddle of Lead
Description: Grants a heart container, fully heals the player, increases damage by 30%, increases dodge roll speed by 15%, increases movement speed by 10%, and adds a chance to negate damage.

Name: Ring of Chest Friendship
Description: Increases the chance of finding chests.

Name: Ring of Chest Vampirism
Description: Breaking chests heals the player.

Name: Ring of Ethereal Form
Description: While active, the player is invincible and has flight. Allows user to steal items from shops.

Name: Ring of Fire Resistance
Description: Grants immunity to fire.

Name: Ring of Mimic Friendship
Description: Chests will not turn into Mimics.

Name: Ring of Miserly Protection
Description: Grants two heart containers. Disappears upon spending money.

Name: Ring of Triggers
Description: Using an active item fires the currently held weapon in all directions.

Name: Ring of the Resourceful Rat
Description: Once per floor, if the Resourceful Rat takes an item or gun, he will give another item or gun of equal quality in return. Unused trades carry over to subsequent floors.

Name: Robot's Left Hand
Description: Rapidly fires blue lasers.

Name: Robot's Right Hand
Description: Starting gun of The Robot. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: Rocket-Powered Bullets
Description: Increases the player's bullet speed by 50%, increases damage by 10%, and increases rate of fire by 10%.

Name: Rogue Special
Description: Fires short-range, inaccurate lasers. Starting gun of The Pilot. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: Roll Bomb
Description: Dodge rolling leaves behind a bomb.

Name: Rolling Eye
Description: Rolling through bullets reflects them at enemies.

Name: Rubenstein's Monster
Description: Created when both RUBE-ADYNE Prototype and RUBE-ADYNE MK.II are picked up. Rapidly fires bouncing lasers.

Name: Ruby Bracelet
Description: Thrown guns will explode.

Name: Rusty Sidearm
Description: Starting gun of The Hunter. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: SAA
Description: Fires bouncing bullets that aim towards enemies after bouncing.

Name: Sawed-Off
Description: Starting gun of The Convict.

Name: Scattershot
Description: Guns fire a spread of tripled bullets which deal less damage.

Name: Science Cannon
Description: Fires a large laser after a short charge-up, which inflicts random status effects on enemies.

Name: Scope
Description: Decreases bullet spread by 60%.

Name: Scouter
Description: Shows enemy health and damage done. Increases damage and accuracy. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Screecher
Description: Rapidly fires piercing sound waves that have a small chance to stun.

Name: Sense of Direction
Description: Points in the direction of the floor's exit.

Name: Ser Junkan
Description: Summons Ser Junkan, who follows the player, attacks enemies, and becomes stronger for each Junk picked up.

Name: Serious Cannon
Description: Fires large bouncing cannonballs.

Name: Seven-Leaf Clover
Description: Increases the quality ofÂ chestsÂ found in chest rooms to an equal chance of red or black.

Name: Shades's Revolver
Description: Increases coolness by 3.

Name: Shadow Bullets
Description: Firing a weapon has a chance to fire an additional projectile.

Name: Shadow Clone
Description: Creates a copy of the player that mimics their movements in reverse and fires alongside them.

Name: Shell
Description: Fires three shotguns, each of which fires three bullets upon hitting something.

Name: Shellegun
Description: Reloading alternates between a pistol and a continuous beam. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Shelleton Key
Description: Allows any chest or lock to be opened without using a key. Increases curse by 1 while held.

Name: Shield of the Maiden
Description: Pulls up a shield to protect players from bullets. Players are immobile while using the shield.

Name: Shock Rifle
Description: Fires a zap of electricity.

Name: Shock Rounds
Description: Creates a beam of electricity between fired bullets.

Name: Shotbow
Description: Fires a shotgun blast of bolts.

Name: Shotga Cola
Description: Increases movement speed.

Name: Shotgrub
Description: Fires a spread of 5 bullets that leave small pools of poison goop.

Name: Shotgun Coffee
Description: Increases movement speed.

Name: Shotgun Full of Hate
Description: Shoots a shotgun burst of skulls, nails, regular bullets, and poison bullets that leave pools of poison goop.

Name: Shotgun Full of Love
Description: Has a chance to Charm enemies.

Name: Silencer
Description: Fires zippers. Hitting an enemy with the swing of the weapon will stun the enemy.

Name: Silver Bullets
Description: Increases damage toÂ jammedÂ enemies by 225% and Increases damage toÂ bossesÂ by 25%.

Name: Singularity
Description: Spawns a black hole that attracts enemies and bullets.

Name: Siren
Description: Fires a shotgun blast of bullets that leave pools of water. Negates fall damage and goop effects while equipped.

Name: Sixth Chamber
Description: Increases Coolness by 2 for each point of Curse the player has. Increases curse by 2 while held. Removes the usual curse penalty towards getting a room clearing reward.

Name: Skull Spitter
Description: Fires homing skulls.

Name: Sling
Description: Fires bouncing rocks. Deals 2.5x damage to bosses and 2x damage after bouncing.

Name: Slinger
Description: Starting weapon of The Gunslinger. Reloading throws the gun, which has a chance to stun enemies. Does not crack secret walls.

Name: Smiley's Revolver
Description:
Decreases shop prices while held.

Fire rate increased shortly after rolling.

Name: Smoke Bomb
Description: Temporarily become invisible to enemies. Can be used to steal from the Shop.

Name: Snakemaker
Description: Has a chance to transmogrify enemies into snakes.

Name: Sniper Rifle
Description: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

Name: Snowballer
Description: Fires snowballs that have a chance to freeze enemies.

Name: Snowballets
Description: Bullets increase in size and damage as they travel.

Name: Space Friend
Description: Follows the player, firing lasers at enemies and blocking enemy bullets.

Name: Spice
Description: Single use. Increases certain stats upon use, depending on how many times it has been used. Each time a spice cube is used, more spice cubes will spawn in place of items or pickups.

Name: Sponge
Description: Removes all liquids near the player and allows the player to understand Professor Goopton

Name: Springheel Boots
Description: Allows the player to roll again mid-roll.

Name: Sprun
Description: Temporarily transforms into Windgunner under special circumstances.

Name: Staff of Firepower
Description: Reloading alternates between a rapid fire pistol and a beam weapon that can set enemies on fire.

Name: Starpew
Description: Fires water droplets. Can be charged to increase the number of droplets fired.

Name: Sticky Crossbow
Description: Fires bolts that stick to enemies and explode upon reloading.

Name: Stinger
Description: Fires homing rockets that explode into bees.

Name: Stone Dome
Description: Sits on the player's head and rapidly fires homing bullets. While held, inflicts fear on nearby enemies. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Stout Bullets
Description: Increases damage at close range and decreases as bullets travel.

Name: Strafe Gun
Description: Fires nails that explode upon releasing the trigger.

Name: Stuffed Star
Description: While active, the player is invincible.

Name: Sunglasses
Description: Slows down time and increases dodge power during explosions. Increases coolness by 2.

Name: Sunlight Javelin
Description: Shoots fiery javelins that make enemies take damage over time.

Name: Super Hot Watch
Description: Slows down time immensely while standing still. Moving speeds up time back to normal.

Name: Super Meat Gun
Description: Fires piercing, bouncing saw blades. Slightly increases movement speed.

Name: Super Space Turtle
Description: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.

Name: Supply Drop
Description: Single use. Spawns ammo box.

Name: T-Shirt Cannon
Description: Fires t-shirts that have high knockback.

Name: Table Tech Blanks
Description: Flipping a table activates a free blank.

Name: Table Tech Heat
Description: Flipping a table creates a large area in which all enemies will be set on fire.

Name: Table Tech Money
Description: Flipping a table flips all other tables in the room, and flipping a table has a chance to spawn money.

Name: Table Tech Rage
Description: Flipping a table briefly doubles the player's damage.

Name: Table Tech Rocket
Description: Flipping a table causes it to launch forward and explode.

Name: Table Tech Shotgun
Description: Tables release a homing shotgun blast of bullets when flipped.

Name: Table Tech Sight
Description: Flipping a table briefly slows down time and triple the player's shots.

Name: Table Tech Stun
Description: Flipping a table briefly stuns nearby enemies.

Name: Tangler
Description: Fires a shotgun blast of rectangular bullets that bounce off walls. Enemies hit will be folded into a rectangle.

Name: Teapot
Description: While reloading, ignites nearby enemies.

Name: Tear Jerker
Description: Fires tears that leave behind puddles of water.

Name: Teleporter Prototype
Description: Teleports the player to a random room.

Name: Tetrominator
Description: Fires random tetrominoes that stick to enemies. Line pieces explode, dealing more damage the more tetrominoes are stuck to an enemy.

Name: The Emperor
Description: Fires a burst of four bullets connected by electricity.

Name: The Exotic
Description: Fires rockets which burst into more homing rockets. While held, grants a ghost companion that follows the player and reveals the contents of nearby chests.

Name: The Fat Line
Description: Fires purple bullets, which start at the wall the gun is aimed at and travel back towards the gun. Bullets will curve and home in on enemies as they travel.

Name: The Judge
Description: The final shot of each clip has a chance to poison, freeze or ignite enemies. (likely more effects possible)

Name: The Kiln
Description: Fires pots that break into 3 bouncing crystals upon hitting something.

Name: The Membrane
Description: Fires a shotgun blast of bouncing green bullets that split into more bouncing green bullets.

Name: The Predator
Description: Locks onto enemies and fires high speed homing lasers. Invisibility while reloading an empty magazine.

Name: The Scrambler
Description: Fires bullets that hatch into many homing bullets upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

Name: Thunderclap
Description: Fires balls of lightning.

Name: Ticket
Description: Summons Gatling Gull as a temporary ally.

Name: Trashcannon
Description: Fires a trash bag that explodes into poison projectiles that leave trails of poison goop.

Name: Trick Gun
Description: Reloading transforms the gun between a pistol and a shotgun.

Name: Trident
Description: Fires a long-range laser that pierces one enemy. Destroys nearby bullets and pushes enemies away while reloading.

Name: Triple Crossbow
Description: Reloading alternates between triple bolts and single bolts that slow enemies.

Name: Triple Gun
Description: Changes form based on how much ammo it has left.

Name: Trusty Lockpicks
Description: Has a 50% chance to unlock a lock or locked chest. If it fails, the lock will no longer function.

Name: Turbo-Gun
Description: Damage increases for the next magazine depending on the number of reload attempts during its reload.

Name: Turkey
Description: Recovers 1 ammo after landing three sequential hits.

Name: Turtle Problem
Description: Clearing a room spawns a turtle companion. Turtles block enemy bullets and die after taking enough damage.

Name: Unfinished Gun
Description: Fires piercing bullets.

Name: Unicorn Horn
Description: Fires a rainbow beam that homes in on enemies. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Unity
Description: Increases damage based on the other guns the player has.

Name: Uranium Ammolet
Description: Blanks have a chance to poison enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Utility Belt
Description: Grants an extra active item slot and increases maximum ammo by 20%.

Name: VertebraeK-47
Description: Bullets close to each other will form links between each other, which hurts enemies on touch.

Name: Void Core Assault Rifle
Description: Fires bursts of three lasers.

Name: Void Core Cannon
Description: Fires bursts of four large energy balls, which home in on enemies and explode upon impact.

Name: Void Shotgun
Description: Fires 6 purple bullets with high knockback.

Name: Vorpal Bullets
Description: Whenever the player fires, occasionally fires a special high-damage bullet.

Name: Vorpal Gun
Description: Has a chance to fire a critical shot which deals 20 times its damage.

Name: Wax Wings
Description: Grants flight.

Name: Weird Egg
Description: Using the egg while missing health fully heals the player. Dropping the egg and shooting it spawns a gun, item, or yolk creature. Dropping the egg into fire spawns a serpent.

Name: White Guon Stone
Description: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants an extra blank per floor.

Name: Winchester
Quote: Better Than A Box Of Roses

Name: Wind Up Gun
Description: In each magazine, the first 10 bullets pierce. The last 10 deal half damage.

Name: Wingman
Description: Orbits the player, firing rockets at enemies.

Name: Witch Pistol
Description: Fires bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.

Name: Wolf
Description: Chases and bites enemies.

Name: Wood Beam
Description: Melee weapon that extends itself to hit enemies. Increases curse by 1.

Name: Yari Launcher
Description: Rapidly fires homing rockets. Bypasses the boss DPS cap.

Name: Yellow Chamber
Description: Grants 2 heart containers. Upon entering a room, there is a chance that an enemy will be charmed for the duration of the room. Increases fire rate by 15%. Increase curse by 2 while held.

Name: Zilla Shotgun
Description: Can be charged to fire the entire magazine at once, which will cause it to fire piercing, bouncing bullets.

Name: Zombie Bullets
Description: Adds a chance to refund ammo when a shot misses.

Name: Zorgun
Description: Rapidly fires homing bullets. The final bullet in each clip fires a random explosive (grenade, rocket, or drill).

Name: iBomb Companion App
Description: Detonates all explosives and explosive enemies in the room.
